name: Grey Collins
description: Well first of all, i will state that most of the qualities in me, are discovered mostly on how people perciev me. I am loving, caring, honest and romantic gentle man, being romantic is something i inherited from my Irish father. When it comes to accommodating, accepting people and paying attention to others and their idea, i do that will the quest to understand more about them and build a better relationship with them, segregation, selfishness and dishonesty are things that i detest. I work hard, love traveling whenever i have free moment, I would like to tell more personal things about me, as we engage is chat. I am gentle, loving, honest and caring person, atleast have gotten that compliment from people on many occassions. I cherish family life and companion so much and love traveling with my love one, i prefer so say more when i am asked. Thanks
